text:
@NYGovCuomo This plannedemic should have ended weeks ago. Sure, #Hydroxychoroquine can cause retinal damage - FOR ONLY 1% of patients after 5 YEARS of daily use for lupus etc!!  Just 5 DAYS of #Plaquinil ends the symptoms of #coronavirus / #COVID19.
